name: ZENI GOLF
description:
ZENI GOLF is a challenging golf platformer.

Climb to the top while precisely aiming and powering your swings.



But do so carefully as each move that can get you closer to the top can just as easily send you into a freefall back to where you started.



-Simple and Easy to Play-
Left click and drag to aim and power your jump, right click to let it fly

-Randomly Generated Levels-
Each level is randomly generated each time you play and switching to a new level is one click away
Input your own seed to practice certain levels or replay favorites
